videos.title: Ride with Valtteri Bottas & Tiffany Cromwell: Wollombi Gravel Fest, a dream weekend of cycling (pt1)
videos.description:
Join me for a ride in the Wollombi valley, when I join pro cyclist Tiffany Cromwell and Valtteri Bottas for a weekend to remember. Two days, two rides. Plenty of likeminded people, good vibes, great food, ideal gravel riding terrain and fantastic organisation… this is part 1 of the ‘Story Of My Ride’ at the first Wollombi Gravel Fest.
Wollombi, I would discover, is the perfect spot for a weekend getaway... with the family and your bike(s). Together with my son, Louis, and ±100 other riders we explored the region, ate fine food, escape the pre-Christmas stress in the city, and enjoyed some quality time on the bike.

– Rob 

Recorded on 21 December 2024

– Filming, commentary, and editing by Rob Arnold

videos.title: Gravel riding with Valtteri Bottas & Tiffany Cromwell at Wollombi Gravel Fest, making cycling fun!
videos.description:
This was a short ride but it rounded out 48 hours in Wollombi Valley, and provided the perfect ending for the first Wollombi Gravel Fest. In the company of around 120 other bike riders, I rode on perfect gravel roads with my son... and then on my own. It was a few hours of cycling bliss... and I hope you enjoy a video that I'm actually really quite proud of making.
It says a lot even though it is completely and absolutely unscripted. 

In part one: I join pro cyclist Tiffany Cromwell and F1 driver / gravel rider Valtteri Bottas for a weekend to remember. Two days, two rides. 
https://youtu.be/CFOKk9gc4MA?si=YMAd-5qMBtbp0tof

Thanks to Kristy, Tiffany, Valtteri, Louis and the many others who helped make this a weekend remember!

– Rob 

Recorded on 22 December 2024

– Filming, commentary, and editing by Rob Arnold
